Room.Name: Ashton River Road
Room.ShortDescription: The Ashton River flows from Hafnia Mountain through the great canyon that separates Tasletek Mountain from Mount Aphinix.
Room.LongDescription: The beautiful city of Hafnia, built by the elves after their wars with the mountain trolls and the dragons, is at the headwaters of this sparkling river. If you follow this road, it will eventually take you there, but the way may be dangerous. Oceancrest is southwest of here.
